script_functionality.purpose: Profiling the performance of convolutional neural network (CNN) kernels implemented in PyTorch
tasks: Copying the script to the run directory
Changing directory to the run directory
Defining a list of network parameters
Defining a list of metrics to be profiled
Iterating over different network parameters, precisions, data formats, and compute types (calibration, forward, backward)
Running the PyTorch script with `nv-nsight-cu-cli` to profile the kernel performance
Generating profile output files with names corresponding to the network parameters, precision, data format, and compute type
